title: Nixon Announces Resignation - 1974 | Today In History | 8 Aug 17
description:
On August 8, 1974, President Richard Nixon announced his resignation, effective the next day, following damaging new revelations in the Watergate scandal.


US President, Richard Nixon, delivers his resignation speech


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/db6076b19d1480ea6a7eb2f9e8002a2e
